text: Niscaya nai hamile aphna paigambaraharula'i spasta nisaniharu di'era pathayaum ra uniharumathi kitaba ra tula avatarita garyaum taki manisaharu n'yayama drdha rahun ra phalama pani utaryaum. Tyasama thulo khatara cha ra nikai baliyo cha ra manisaharuka lagi aru pani pha'idaharu chan, ra yasa karana pani ki allaha thaha pa'ihalos ki ko paroksama rahamdai usako ra usaka rasulaharuko sahayata gardacha. Niscaya nai allaha saktisali ra adhipatyasali cha
